actions.name: Perfectionist
actions.description: Effect: All of the user's actions use 1 more PP. The user's attacks with <60 default Power gain [Crit 1], and those with <40 default Power also gain [Priority 1]. If any affected attack already had either of these Trait types, their values increase by +1.

system.description: Effect: All of the user's actions use 1 more PP. The user's attacks with <60 default Power gain [Crit 1], and those with <40 default Power also gain [Priority 1]. If any affected attack already had either of these Trait types, their values increase by +1.
